values: "Blue" Looking through black and white albums, lives the brightest tint of blue i've seen Amongst the pigments of the others, Is the only blue I see No black or white has saved me It's the blue that carries me I know i'll fade without blue, But I must let the color free Still, this prism is a jail cell Why wont the rainbow let us be? And in these black and white albums, lives the brightest tint of blue i've seen.
http://poetic-nytemare.livejournal.com/4589.html

"Thoughtless Act One"

Now, one day just wont count
When there's others to come
If I cut out the heartache
Then this body'd go numb

When these curtains go up
Will the viewers just shun?
Or will they throw in their kercheif
For this thoughtless act one?

The Drummer Starts,
The singer dies
The audience awakes
Opens up its white eyes
Authorities enter
Letting out hollow sighs
They take him out
Fill his void up with lies

Then they'll break him apart
While he's dressed all in pink
Should he be ambivilant
To what the rest of them think?

The Drummer Starts,
The singer dies
The audience awakes
Opens up its white eyes
Authorities enter
Letting out hollow sighs
They take him out
Fill his void up with lies

Now
Is he through
Is he done
Are the satisfied yet, with this
Thoughtless Act One

"PLEASE"

PLEASE WAKE ME UP
    BEFORE I LOSE ALL THESE YEARS
PLEASE PULL ME OUT
    BEFORE I DROWN IN THESE TEARS

PLEASE OPEN ME UP
    FOR, I'M ABOUT TO SCREAM
PLEASE TELL ME IT'S FAKE
    THAT IT'S ALL JSUT A DREAM

PLEASE LIE TO ME
    BUT SPEAK WORDS OF TRUTH
PLEASE AGE ME TO FIX THIS
    BUT DON'T TAKE MY YOUTH

PLEASE MAKE THIS END
    LET IT COME TO A CLOSE
PLEASE SAY IT WAS A JOKE
    THIS IS NOT HOW IT GOES

PLEASE KNOCK ME OUT
    I WANT TO LOSE THIS FEELING
PLEASE REMOVE THESE CASTS
    THE WOUNDS WONT BE HEALING

This one kinda sucks too... "So You Told Me" He woke up that morning Knowing the God awful truth That it wasn't a dream But he pretended anyway He went about his routine Took the little pill Pushed it out of his mind To try to get through his day Chorus: How can I save you When i'm falling too? How do I keep you here If what's beneath me fell through? How will I go on I wont know what to do I can't stop my loss When all i've had is you Drove off to work What a waste of his time Couldn't get past it He'd rather have died That look on the boss's face When he opened the office door Said he couldn't do this As he walked out and cried

Fuck this poem...
Fuck it hard in the ass...
It sucks hardcore
Let's all go slit our wrists, shall we?

"The Need For a Visible Loss"

I thought all these feelings were fone
I thought I was done
I thought I was past this
I thought I had won

But here I am crying 
I'm watching myself fail
Too depressed to work
I feel i'm on the same trail

I hate being a burdon
But I really hate dying
I'm losing to addiction
Am I even trying?

I hate lying to you
You're so honest to me
I don't deserve your insight
When i'm to scared to even see

Confusion is breaking me
It's not that it's pushing me back,
But rather holding me still
'Till I hear every bone crack

And I can't start again
'Till I watch myself lose
Can't get back on track
'Till i've felt each empty bruise

Playing off my other entry...
I'm going to update with a million fucking poems!

"All I Had"

So Sick

I'm just so sick
Sick of mourning the loss of sleep
The sleep I don't get
When you're not there...

So Heavy

Weighed by fears
Burdoned with broken hopes
Tripped from abondoned dreams
When you're not there

Chorus:
You have no idea
I was so near failing
  So near fading...
Then all i had was your hand...
...It's amazing what one hand can hold.

So Empty

No fullfillment
I was a half empty glass
'Till you found a gallon in me
How did you make me see?

So Far

I'd fallen so far
Lost; too far down
Then you flaced my foot on a ladder and pushed

Chorus x1

So Blind

Too scared to move foreward
Couldn't see through the present's fog
Any pigment in the past was painted black
You never let me go

So Cold

My hope was fridgid, and i bacame numb
Held by your warmth
Because you let me know
That y ou'd never let me go

Chorus x2

Yeah, i know...again, it's been a REALLY long time since i've updated this thinggy, but that doesn't mean i haven't been writing. I wrote this one a long tiem ago-probably last summer-ish.

"Don't"

Don't push me 
Or i'll take you down too
Don't tell me 
It's just between me and you

Don't tell me
What to believe
Don't force me
I have the world to perceive

Don't hold me
I'll escape your embrace
Don't lie to me
You think i'm a disgrace

Don't cling to me
Because I know you'll push me away
Don't love me
It contradicts what you say

Don't nurture me
You've done a terrible job
Don't compliment me
You think i'm an unfaithful slob

Don't touch me
Your hands are filled with hate
Don't comfort me
It's your fault i'm in this state

Dont try to fix it
Just let go, let me fly
Don't hold me in
It's time we said goodbye

It's been a long time since i've written a poem, but here you go! I hate titles. They can go to hell...so...this one has no title, much like many of the poems I write.

Save yourself, my dear
Just open up your eyes
The sparrow has to spread its wings
Before it ever flies

Don't resist your deep blue tears
Just cry for heavan's sake
Dwell not in the puddle-
-But in the ocean your tears make

Stand upon a solid ground
Though winds be ever strong
Just clutch the dirt beneath you
Then bellow out your song

When night has tempt'd your courage
Fly without a fear
When sandstorms steal your sight
Fight back- Awake your ear

Waves will try to move you
They'll maim you on the shore
But swim through your tsunamis
And stand up and ask for more.
http://poetic-nytemare.livejournal.com/2371.html

Who will cry for the little girl
Who knew not how to speak?
Who will cry for the little girl
Who's heart was growing weak?

Who will cry for the little girl
Who saw only pain and fear?
Who will cry for the little girl
Who expressed it through each tear?

Who will cry for the little girl
Who pleaded to God with, "Why?"
Who will cry for the little girl
Who begged to mearly die?

Who will cry for the little girl
Who's wings had never spread?
Who will cry for the little girl
Who's past she quickly fled?

Who will cry for the little girl
That sanctaty never knew?
Who will cry for the little girl
Who barely made it through?

Who will cry for the little girl
The girl who could not see?
Who will cry for the little girl
Who cries inside of me?

Ok...so i didn't completely write this on my own...It's from the movie "Antwon Fisher." He writes this poem after talking with a psychiatrist for a little bit. He reads the poem to the psychiatrist (played by Denzel Washington) and he replies, "Who will cry for that little boy?" and Antwon's response is, "I will, sir"

So...i thought it was a sweet poem. Everything in blue, is a line i stole from the poem in the movie...except he's a boy, and i'm a girl...lol.

I've got 3 possible titles...they are: "How do you speak", "Inquiries on speach" or "My personal Lack for Words".

What do all you people think???

 

"Insert Title Here...lol"

How do you speak a feeling?
Are words not born at heart?
How do you speak the moment
When your life falls apart?

How do you speak personality?
Is it not a state of mind?
How do you speak forgiveness
For those who were left behind?

How do you speak true love?
Love and speach can decieve
How do you speak gratitude
For the care that you recieve

How do you speak desire?
The yearning for something more
How do you speak you dissapointment
For desires you have to ignore?

How do you speak passion?
The perserverance to achieve dreams
How do you speak the loss you feel
When your hopes are ripped at the seams?

How do you speak the sorrow
That dwells amongst the past?
How do you speak a new start
When in the end it will never last?


Fuck commentary...
http://poetic-nytemare.livejournal.com/1851.html

"Fight"

Fast blinking lights
Scream and yell
Face the facts
The world's gone to hell

When preference of love
Can spring disgust
Why would you speak?
Who can you trust?

With help from the media
We're pumped full of fear
But when will we know
The truth we never hear?

Pay for the war
Work for the fight
Give to the army
Out of your sight

Fight for you country
Of cheeseburgers and apple pie
Do as you're told
And never ask why

Be a mindless drone
Become the "Norm"
Disreguard your opinions
It's time to conform

This is our country
No individuality
They say if you're different
It's a loss of your sanity

You can't hold me to a label
I wont be classified
I'll be who i want
And i'll no longer hide

I'm not gonna take it
I'll prove that i'm right
I'll dare to be different
I'll hold my own fight
http://poetic-nytemare.livejournal.com/1666.html

"A Creepy Poem"

Wondering eyes
Captive disguise
The movement of those unseen

Staring inside
No way to hide
They'll rip at your soul 'till it's clean

Neurotic dreams
Nothing as it seems
No escape from your very own mind

Illusions seem real
But there's nothing to feel
The visions have made you blind

Not your own voice
Someone else's choice
Speaking the silence within

No punishment for crime
Just pay with your time
Living immortal sin

No motivation
Dead situation
The joy of it all drawn out

The scars shall run deep
The sorrow you'll weep
Your means to cope with pain

The blood that will pour
Can't take anymore
The last silent slice at your vain

Nicole encouraged me to start doing commentary again, so....here it is! To me, it's obvious what the poem is about-Maybe too obvious to the point where people think it's so much deeper than it really is. It's about scizophrenia. Anyone know how to correctly spell it? Yep. That mental dissorder, in which vacoules in the brain expand to the auditory, and occipital, as well as other parts of the brain. It also causes severe depression, mixed and unclear thoughts, and sometimes illusions and/or voices. A lot of people don't understand this strange dissorder at all-A lot of people think it's just about hearing voices. So...i wrote a poem about it! In the end, the victim kills themself by mutilation. (Suicide is common in this dissorder)

This one has no title. Anyone have any suggestions? I'd appreciate it...


"Help me Think of a Title or I'll Die..."

Living this life beneath the stars
Alive to what one knows
Fleeting to a cognitive world
To reality, nothing shows.

To feel this true inner emotion
To learn what lives inside
Escape society's binding arms
Rules shall not abide

Speaking with one's own heart
No impulse to arrest
No one to second guess your faith
To have hope without a test

THe freedom to love the loveable
To feel whatever comes
TO learn what you truly love and hate
And release the pain that numbs

To live without the weight of life
Ease the throbbing pain
Disreguard the faults of the earth
Live life not in vain-

Beleiving what you feel is fit
No one to tell you you're wrong
Not having to give up things
Just to simply belong

The chance to find yourself
Admittance of what you lack
A place to never dwell on the past
And never have to look back

(Leslie typed it up...blame typos on her............LUV U LESS-LEE!!)
http://poetic-nytemare.livejournal.com/874.html

"Another Start to End"

Another day under the sun
Baked from years of heat
Thrown upon the ground
Can't move from being beat

Another night out in the cold
With no light to guide the way
Horizons, hopes, and faith
All been ripped away

Another noon without a lunch
Nothing to consume
No one offers a hand
For they know not what to say

Another monelouge to be done
This scripted life's a play
With characters done poorly
For they know not what to say

Another morning in the mist
The fog that never ends
Hopelessness and fear
Are all this breakfast lends

Another blackened wound
Amongst the morning scars
The nothingness the heal
Scattered beneath the stars

Another bleeding sigh
Coughing up despair
A need to finally breathe
A need to find the air

Another fight to lose
Never gain a win
Never recieve forgiveness
Even though there is no sin

Another set of eyes
Unforgiving as they be
Covered over with shame
To they point they cannot see

Another sleepless night
Followed by exhausted day
With a past that keeps on haunting
We'll never get away

Another pen and paper
To speak from out my heart
To finish up my ending
And return back to the start
